quizDescription: Test your knowledge of sci-fi movies with this futuristic trivia quiz!

questions.question: In the movie 'Star Wars: A New Hope,' what is the name of Luke Skywalker's home planet?
questions.explanation: In 'Star Wars: A New Hope,' Luke Skywalker's home planet is Tatooine.

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie follows a group of intergalactic criminals who must work together to stop a powerful orb from falling into the wrong hands?
questions.explanation: The sci-fi movie 'Guardians of the Galaxy' follows a group of intergalactic criminals who must work together to stop a powerful orb from falling into the wrong hands.

questions.question: In the movie 'Back to the Future,' what is the name of the time-traveling car?
questions.explanation: In 'Back to the Future,' the name of the time-traveling car is DeLorean.

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie is set in a post-apocalyptic world where machines have taken over and enslaved humanity?
questions.explanation: The sci-fi movie 'The Matrix' is set in a post-apocalyptic world where machines have taken over and enslaved humanity.

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie features a genetically engineered dinosaur theme park that goes awry?
questions.explanation: The sci-fi movie 'Jurassic Park' features a genetically engineered dinosaur theme park that goes awry.

questions.question: In the movie 'Inception,' what is the process of entering another person's dreams called?
questions.explanation: In 'Inception,' the process of entering another person's dreams is called dreamwalking.

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie features a spaceship crew that encounters a hostile alien creature with acid for blood?
questions.explanation: The sci-fi movie 'Alien' features a spaceship crew that encounters a hostile alien creature with acid for blood.

questions.question: In the movie 'E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial,' what is the name of the friendly alien?
questions.explanation: In 'E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial,' the name of the friendly alien is E.T.

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie explores the concept of a computer program creating a simulated reality for humans?
questions.explanation: The sci-fi movie 'The Matrix' explores the concept of a computer program creating a simulated reality for humans.

questions.question: What is the name of the planet-destroying weapon in the 'Star Wars' franchise?
questions.explanation: In the 'Star Wars' franchise, the planet-destroying weapon is called the Death Star.

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie features a team of explorers who travel through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet for humanity?
options: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
questions.explanation: The sci-fi movie 'Interstellar' features a team of explorers who travel through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet for humanity.

questions.question: In the movie 'Blade Runner,' what is the primary task of the replicants?
questions.explanation: In 'Blade Runner,' the primary task of the replicants is Off-World Colonization.

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie features a young boy who discovers a stranded alien and helps him return to his home planet?
options: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
The Day the Earth Stood Still
questions.explanation: The sci-fi movie 'E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial' features a young boy who discovers a stranded alien and helps him return to his home planet.

questions.question: What is the name of the highly intelligent and malevolent computer system in the '2001: A Space Odyssey'?
questions.explanation: In '2001: A Space Odyssey,' the highly intelligent and malevolent computer system is named HAL 9000.

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie features a group of astronauts who are sent to investigate a mysterious monolith discovered on the Moon?
options: The Day the Earth Stood Still
questions.explanation: The sci-fi movie '2001: A Space Odyssey' features a group of astronauts who are sent to investigate a mysterious monolith discovered on the Moon.
